rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0001
rows.name: Wh-Who's next?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Calm down.
The enemies around here are cleared out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0003
rows.name:
No enemy signatures detected in the vicinity.
All enemy craft within the combat zone, sweep complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0004
rows.name: Understood[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0005
rows.name: We did it, Elma-san![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_JNK0010
rows.name: Be Cautious

rows.label: xs08070100_SEL0011
rows.name: Brace yourself, suggesting this is just the start.

rows.label: xs08070100_JNK0020
rows.name: Be Optimistic

rows.label: xs08070100_SEL0021
rows.name: Look at Lin, expecting a celebratory meal.

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0006
rows.name: That's probably right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0007
rows.name:
If they came intending to take NLA,
their numbers are too small.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0008
rows.name: They tucked their tails and ran away from Tatsu's fearsomeness-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0009
rows.name: Tatsu was doing his best, wasn't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0010
rows.name: I'll whip up a feast today![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Yay-meh!
A party-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0012
rows.name: Not yet[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0013
rows.name:
If they came intending to take NLA,
their numbers are too small.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0014
rows.name:
New enemy air assets confirmed!
Directly overhead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0015
rows.name: Approaching at high speed from directly above NLA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Just as I thought, the ground attack was a feint.
We'll engage them inside the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0017
rows.name: We're fighting in the city streets?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0018
rows.name: Lin, I understand how you feel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0019
rows.name:
But now that it's come to this, city combat is unavoidable.
If we're afraid of damaging it and end up losing everything, there's no point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Enemy air assets have breached the defense line!
Entering NLA airspace![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0021
rows.name: This is terrible-meh! This is terrible-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0022
rows.name: Let's hurry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08070100_MSG0023
rows.name: Roger![ST:wait ]
